channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: President Lai Visits Troops To Boost Morale Amid China Drills
item.description: President Lai Ching-te has visited a Marine Corps Brigade in northern Taiwan to show support for the military and speak about the threats Taiwan faces.

item.title: New Taiwan Premier Holds First High-Level Meetings
item.description: Newly appointed Premier Cho Jung-tai has held his first major meetings since taking office, talking with city mayors and U.S. diplomats.

item.title: Analysis: China Seeking More Opportunities To Practice Taiwan Operations
item.description: The military exercises China is holding around Taiwan are some of the largest in history, but what is Beijing trying to accomplish?

item.title: Taiwan President Lai Faces Disruption at Home and Abroad in Tough First Week
item.description: As China continues a second day of drills around Taiwan it says are "punishment" for new President Lai Ching-te's comments on Taiwanese sovereignty, the country is also facing anot
